label: Task-2
title: Complete Lambda lifecycle methods (exists/verify/delete/verify_deleted)
description: Extend Deploy__Service (or create app__deploy__aws__lambda wrapper) with full lifecycle: exists() to check if function exists, verify() to confirm configuration correctness (runtime, handler, memory, layers, env vars, Function URL), lock_down() to restrict Function URL resource policy, delete() to destroy the function, verify_deleted() to confirm removal. Uncomment test_8__delete in deploy test bases and add round-trip test.

properties.acceptance_criteria: All 6 lifecycle methods implemented and tested. Round-trip passes: create -> verify -> delete -> verify_deleted -> create -> verify. Works for both Admin and User Lambdas across dev/qa/prod stages.
